hostname.description: Hostname of the ArangoDB server. Prefix with 'http://' for localhost or 'https://' for remote servers.

port.description: Port on which the ArangoDB server is running.

dbName.description: Name of the database to sync the data to.

username.description: Username for authenticating with the ArangoDB server.

password.description: Password for authenticating with the ArangoDB server.

collection.description: Name of the collection to sync the data to.

protocol.description: Protocol to use for connecting to the ArangoDB server.

batch_size.description: Maximum number of documents to batch together for writing in a single operation.

batch_size_bytes.description: Maximum size of documents (in bytes) to batch together for writing in a single operation.
